definitions.title: vb. Niph.
definitions.body: shut oneself in or off (NH id., Pt. pass. restrained (esp. from marriage), also [[עוֹגִין]] anchor; Targum [[עֲגַן]] be imprisoned);—Impf. 2 fpl. [[תֵּעָגֵ֫נׇה לְבִלְתִּי הֱיוֹת לְאִישׁ]] Ru 1:13 would ye shut yourselves off, so as not to belong to a man ?
